name: Falling Blocks 2D
description:
Glad to say that this is my first (actual) game!!! Many more to come after this one :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Falling Blocks 2D is a game that was inspired by the Xbox Live Indie Title "Falling Blocks", but, created with a unique spin.

Venture up the falling blocks as they create a way for you to advance to the next level! Watch out though, the falling blocks will make you have to restart the level. . . also, watch out for that SNEAKY lava, they will also make you restart!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
